data.title: UITextField crash when text exceeds content with enabled cursor
data.body:
Repeating:
In UITextFieldTest_LineWrap::init

add 
'''textField->setCursorEnabled( true );'''
after
''' TextField\* textField = TextField::create("input words here","fonts/Marker Felt.ttf",30);'''

then run test and in test tape some letters till test will crash.

data.title: [ci skip]return true for preload though it is not implemented
fix android editbox custom font file
EditBox can't use custom font on Android platform
Some lua bindings fixes:
data.body:
1) Reverts changes in  #15443, the behavor of LuaEngine::handleCommonEvent should not be changed. empty eventName should be supported, otherwise it will break compatiblity.
2) Null pointer check in CommonScriptData initialization
3) No error callback in lua (fixed #15904)

data.title: Update html5 engine to v3.12
Fix ParticleSystem::_paused varible isn't initialized. Particle will show or hide after being created randomly.
fix system font creation on Android platform
data.body: Since this PR https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/pull/9915/files changed the default behavior of `fullPathForFilename`, when pass system font name isn't a valid file path, it will return empty string.

data.title: JSScript* may be garbage collected before the next time executing the same JS file.
WebSocket.cpp LOGD(..) using printf for logging but not console window is opened when starting game
data.body:
in the code  the line #define  LOGD(...) printf(**VA_ARGS**) : 

```
#if COCOS2D_DEBUG > 0
    #ifdef ANDROID
        #define  LOGD(...)  __android_log_print(ANDROID_LOG_DEBUG, LOG_TAG,__VA_ARGS__)
    #else
        #define  LOGD(...) printf(__VA_ARGS__)
    #endif
#else
    #define  LOGD(...)
#endif
```

is using printf for longing but it useless because i windows there is no console that is opened , all logs should go to : 

```
void CC_DLL log(const char * format, ...) CC_FORMAT_PRINTF(1, 2);
```

cpp-tests Scene3D -> description buttons don't work
data.body:
- cd cpp-tests
- click Node::Scene3D
- click Description
- click `hair` or `glass`

The hair or glass are not changed.

In v3.11, it works as expected. I dont remember if there is any codes except your VR PR changed the logic.

data.title: Bad rendering quality on Windows 10 mobile
data.body:
Please run cpp-test on Windows 10 mobile and Android and compare graphic.
It works fine (on both devices) but quality of rendered app is lower on Windows Phone.

I released (cocos2dx-3.10) exactly the same apps on Google Play and Windows Store. 
1. Google Play (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.crazyhappygame.coloringpagespuzzleforkids).
2. Windows 10: (https://www.microsoft.com/store/apps/9nblggh4m297)

It seems like there is some issue with scaling/smoothing on WindowsPhone.
Both application uses: glview->setDesignResolutionSize(size.width, size.height, ResolutionPolicy::EXACT_FIT);

In attachment screen shots from devices: Android.png and WindowsPhone.png.
Android.png looks much better that WindowsPhone.png. How can I fix it?
Android: 720x1280
![android](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/13263288/16236923/61e5b25c-37da-11e6-98aa-1b20a6f774c0.png)
Windows: 768x1280
![windowsphone](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/13263288/16236931/698df532-37da-11e6-8bdf-ec4a6ae24cc9.png)
